post.body: LMAO
I look forward to the peace that hte end of the semester brings. :-)
too funny, Tom and I played Wii tonight (Mario Kart)
nahhh...we all like to learn the hard way, failing ourselves! LOL
I would LOVE to win a mimobot with in the mimobot twitter contest http://tinyurl.com/6c36y7
hold on to that thought... about to share something with you along that line
thanks, thanks, thanks!
they would have to make their own accounts...I want to just give people a number to call
and I are praising the glory of caring no purse and just rolling with cargo shorts! wallet in one pocket, mobile in other
did you win something?
no...to quote @ljballard "it's a handbag!"
I want to see the picture of HAHA in the sand... I haven't seen it and I'm already LMAO
you spend more time at the candy store (Apple store) than any person I know... I'm jealous!
and @soul4real what is this about secret sushi party?
sushi cures EVERYTHING! @soul4real I goofed, it's Alma School & Queen Creek (yeah, definitely SE valley...no where near you!)
we're meeting for sushi at this little place SE corner of Alma School & McQueen, has wi-fi
seems to have figured out the @ function in twitter. And now he is teasing us all with pics from Hawaii
is on twitter; however, he has yet to post?!
retweet @soul4real: @mimobot I do not want the peace which passeth understanding. I want the understanding which bringeth peace. H. Keller
just ran late from meeting at District to meeting in the CTL at MCC
tried to sleep, but can't. So up to do a little work, some thinking, etc.
I love when a committee meeting gets canceled...I just wished they had told me in advance
off to grab some lunch to share with the girlz in the CTL
retweeting @soul4real @mimobot I love when companies use Twitter in fun ways. You're my new best Tweet friend. shameless I know. :)
I get my office back!
sitting out in open area of the CTL because a student is in my office taking a make-up final...??? I guess I'm too nice!
I just had a student do a kick-butt ignite style presentation!!!
students writing, writing, writing as they take the final
getting ready for class...I get to work, they get to take a final :-)
help-o-twitterverse... I need some tool where people can call in and leave me audio files (like Gabcast...others??)
at cybersalon with... @befitt, @soul4real, @psyan, @drvdiaz, @cogdog, @dgaudet I was running late, easy to find table w/all laptops open
loving my new baby: http://www.flickr.com/photos/puptoes74/3101061027/
sitting at Wildflower with partner's daughter, getting ready to shop. Should have graded first, LOL
grading with @nooccar one more class to go!
sitting in technology audit meeting and missing @metalenigma
up up, grade grade
sitting at chevys waiting for togo for partner...laughing as i catch up on twitter posts.
I now have to leave @befitt to meet with other Britain study abroad faculty (none of whom are on twitter!)
Sushi joint kicking us out...on to cookies at paradise bakery! at least @befitt and I are finally working
happy sushi full tummy
oooh sounds like a virtual sushi party w/ @befitt , @soul4real , @ dgaudet and @cherylcolan how fun!
Damn red left hand turn light at queen creek...keeping me from SUSHI
if those of you following @befitt and I haven't already realized it...today is ALL ABOUT the SUSHI!
oops, I'm glad @befitt is here for backup! listening to U2, drafting for next two videos, ignoring growling tummy...sushi soon enough!
whoo hoo, another video done!
trying to motivate myself to crank out a video or two this morning
excitedly awaiting to attend my first #evfn
Did the Wii Fit - Yoga Poses workout http://tinyurl.com/7c9gb9
Did the Wii Fit - Aerobics workout http://tinyurl.com/7c9gb9
Did the Wii Fit - Balance Games workout http://tinyurl.com/7c9gb9
trying to write up "assignments" for adjunct faculty cafe credit...basically at work :-(
